text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Great if you’re in the #Medical field, tending to your disastrous #CovidResponse.
Great if you’re in the #Tech field, dealing with aftermath of your disastrous response to #Covid19. But hey, it’s ok, #Americans have learned to work around you!

#WeNeverForget
#AmericaOrTrump
